abstract: Jeff Fager, the executive producer of “60 Minutes,” will be named chairman of CBS News, the network announced Tuesday.
snippet: Jeff Fager, the executive producer of “60 Minutes,” will be named chairman of CBS News, the network announced Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: 4:00 p.m. | Updated Jeff Fager, the executive producer of “60 Minutes,” will be named chairman of CBS News on Tuesday, with Sean McManus, the president of CBS News and Sports, returning exclusively to the sports division as chairman, the network said.

headline.main: Jeff Fager to Be Named Chairman of CBS News

byline.original: By Bill Carter and Brian Stelter
